featured.text: Future plans include static barking sites where deer are commonly seen, but “the noises will not be blared in areas where people live beside the tracks.” 53.

definition.zh_def: 發出刺耳的聲音或強烈的噪音。
definition.en_def: To make a loud, harsh sound.
definition.example: The car's horn began to blare as it approached the intersection.
